typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SALESORDERID as integer,
		SALESORDERITEM as integer,
		PRODUCTID as string,
		NOTEID as string,
		CURRENCY as string,
		GROSSAMOUNT as string,
		NETAMOUNT as decimal(10,0),
		TAXAMOUNT as decimal(10,0),
		ITEMATPSTATUS as string,
		OPITEMPOS as string,
		QUANTITY as integer,
		QUANTITYUNIT as string,
		DELIVERYDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> src01BikeSalesItem
src01BikeSalesItem derive(ZPART_YEAR = 2020) ~> dv01BikeSales
dv01BikeSales sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SALESORDERID as integer,
		SALESORDERITEM as integer,
		PRODUCTID as string,
		NOTEID as string,
		CURRENCY as string,
		GROSSAMOUNT as string,
		NETAMOUNT as decimal(10,0),
		TAXAMOUNT as decimal(10,0),
		ITEMATPSTATUS as string,
		OPITEMPOS as string,
		QUANTITY as integer,
		QUANTITYUNIT as string,
		DELIVERYDATE as string,
		ZPART_YEAR as integer
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> snk01BikeSalesItem
